info.description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-remark42.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/django-remark42/) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/) ### Installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install django-remark42 ``` ##### `settings.py` ```python INSTALLED_APPS+= [ 'django_remark42' ] REMARK42_HOST=os.getenv('REMARK42_HOST') REMARK42_SITE_ID=os.getenv('REMARK42_SITE_ID') # optional: REMARK42_MAX_SHOWN_COMMENTS=os.getenv('REMARK42_MAX_SHOWN_COMMENTS') # 15 by default REMARK42_THEME=os.getenv('REMARK42_THEME') # 'light' by default ``` #### Examples ``` {% load remark42 %} ``` comments: ```html
{% remark42_comments_script 'Page Title' %} {% remark42_comments_script 'Page Title' max_shown_comments=10 theme='dark' %} ``` last comments: ```html
{% remark42_last_comments_script %} ``` counter: ```html
{% remark42_counter_script %} ``` #### Links + [github.com/umputun/remark](https://github.com/umputun/remark)

readme42.com
info.name: django-remark42
